author: seungjin-yang
body:
#### PR description:
This PR fixes `MonitorElement: WARNING:setBinLabel` caused by GEM offline DQM not handling the new GEM geometry with GE2/1 demonstrator. See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36860#issuecomment-1028028804.


#### PR validation:
This PR is tested with `12034.0` using the following script.
```bash
CMSSW_BASE=CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-02-03-2300
SCRAM_ARCH=slc7_amd64_gcc10 cmsrel ${CMSSW_BASE}
cd ${CMSSW_BASE}/src
git-cms-merge-topic seungjin-yang:GEM-Offline-DQM-with-GE21-Demonstrator__from-CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-02-03-2300
git-cms-merge-topic francescobrivio:alca-FixGEMsuperchamber_12_3_X
runTheMatrix.py -l 12034.0
```




<!-- Please replace this text with a description of which tests have been performed to verify the correctness of the PR, including the eventual addition of new code for testing like unit tests, test configurations, additions or updates to the runTheMatrix test workflows -->

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
This PR is not a backport. However, It will be backported to 12_2_X as mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36860#issuecomment-1029731325
title: Fix GEM Offline DQM for GE2/1 Demonstrator
